scripts.setup-tests: npm i && npm --prefix ./dashboard-ui i --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix ./node-graphql i
scripts.clean: npm --prefix ./dashboard-ui run stop:test ; npm run clean-root ; npm --prefix ./dashboard-ui run clean ; npm --prefix ./node-graphql run clean
scripts.clean-win: npm --prefix ./dashboard-ui run stop:test-win ; npm run clean-root ; npm --prefix ./dashboard-ui run clean ; npm --prefix ./node-graphql run clean
